sentences.en: " I'll have a bouquet for her, " he thought. " Drouet won't mind. "
sentences.cn: “ 我要送她一束花, " 他心里盘算着, "杜洛埃不会介意的.

sentences.en: He hugged her and handed her a bouquet of roses.
sentences.cn: 他拥抱她,接着递给她一束玫瑰花.

sentences.en: He ordered the coachman to stop at a florist's where he bought a bouquet of roses.
sentences.cn: 他吩咐赶车的在花铺站门前停一下,他在那里买了一束玫瑰花.

sentences.en: He swirled the wine gently in the glass to receive the bouquet.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻旋动杯中酒以吸收酒香.

sentences.en: Her wedding bouquet consisted of roses and ivy.
sentences.cn: 她的婚礼花篮包括玫瑰和长春藤.

sentences.en: It was the bouquet Mr. Riley handed to mother that claimed my curiosity.
sentences.cn: 引起我好奇心的是赖利先生递给母亲的那一束花.

sentences.en: She gathered a bouquet of lilacs.
The 1985 vintage has a stronger bouquet and slight caramelly flavour.
sentences.cn: 这种1985年酿制的陈年佳酿味道更醇厚，带有一种淡淡的焦糖甜味。

sentences.en: The bridal bouquet has traditionally been a symbol of fertility.
sentences.cn: 在传统上,新娘花束时儿女满堂的象征.

sentences.en: The child presented her with a bouquet of flowers.
The woman carried a bouquet of dried violets.
sentences.cn: 那个女子拿着一束干紫罗兰花。

sentences.en: These naturally dried flowers will outlast a bouquet of fresh blooms.
sentences.cn: 这些自然风干的花会比一束鲜花更加持久。

sentences.en: This enhances the complex flavors and bouquet of the wine.
sentences.cn: 这加强了酒的合成的味道.

sentences.en: This term refers to the aroma and bouquet of a beer.
sentences.cn: 对于啤酒的芳香和味蕾的表达词汇是什么?

sentences.en: This wine has a rich bouquet.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒有浓郁的香气.

trans.tran_en: an arrangement of flowers, especially one that you give to someone
